__TOC__

A '''Rivethead''' is a person who listens to and takes part in the industrial music subculture.

'''Music : ''' Rivetheads predominantly listen to artists including, but not limited to: Nitzer Ebb, Throbbing Gristle, Skinny Puppy, Front Line Assembly, Coil, Laibach, SPK, Front 242 and countless others.
